topic.title: POST /gemfire-api/v1/queries/{queryId}
topic.shortdesc: Execute the specified named query passing in scalar values for query parameters in the POST body.

strow.stentry: Bind parameters for the query are specified in the request body (JSON).

stentry.p: Specify the parameter @type and @value for each bind parameter. For example, to provide values to the following query:
stentry.codeblock: SELECT o FROM /orders o WHERE o.quantity > $1 AND o.totalprice > $2
